Class MusicManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.ui.MusicManager
public final class MusicManager extends Object
Manages background music playback for the game. Handles loading, playing, pausing, and switching between music tracks. Supports special looping behavior for "Russia Music" track (17.5 second loop).
Since:
1.0
